title: Thirstype
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Thirstype**

Thirstype is an international group of typographers creating and publishing new typefaces. The foundry was launched in 1994 by [Rick Valicenti](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rick%20Valicenti) to publish his font Bronzo, and was soon expanded to present the work of [Barry Deck](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Barry%20Deck), [Magnus Rakeng](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Magnus%20Rakeng), [Patric King](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Patric%20King), [Chester Jenkins](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chester%20Jenkins), [Paul Sych](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Paul%20Sych), [Frank Ford](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Frank%20Ford), [Patrick Giasson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Patrick%20Giasson), and [Claudio Piccinini](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Claudio%20Piccinini).

The foundry is presently based in New York City.

[http://www.thirstype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003600/http:/www.thirstype.com/ "http://www.thirstype.com/")
author: paul d hunt
